tag_list: fabric-painting, mentoring, teaching, teach, teacher, writer, writing, blogging
overview:
Currently, Diane is retired from business ownership and operation and is doing writing and blogging on her favorite subjects which includes fabric painting.

She is a top level software support engineer with a strong customer service background. Diane is a former US Jaycette officer with many civic awards. She continues to search for other ways to use her talents in volunteer work and has been teaching better spoken and written English (& life mentoring) to asian students since 2003.

She also spends time mentoring and helping others in business and actively participates in her church groups.

relationships.title: Lead Data Operator, Correspondence, Written & Verbal Translation
